title: Director's Innovation Fund
description: To support research and educational projects, including, but not limited to recruitment and equipment at the discretion of the Director of the Gates Center for Regenerative Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To support research and educational projects, including, but not limited to recruitment and equipment at the discretion of the Director of the Gates Center for Regenerative Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
